name: express-crud
description: **Express.js** is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications. It simplifies the process of building server-side applications by providing tools to manage HTTP requests, routes, middlewares, and much more. You can use Express.js to create APIs, single-page applications, and even full-fledged web applications.
author: HiKaru-e
